location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 6759/47 'Amendments to publication Great Britain and the Near East'

physicalDescription.extent: This file consists of a single letter.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio

mods.abstract: This file contains a letter addressed by an India Office official to the editor of the London-based publication, Great Britain and the Near East. The note states that the Nepalese Minister in London, General Shingha, has returned home, and that his successor is expected to arrive in London in June. The file includes a divider which gives the subject number, the year the subject file was opened, the subject heading, and a list of correspondence references by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
